trans-unit.source: An <xref uid="langword_csharp_abstract" name="abstract" href=""></xref> base class that can be implemented to verify an expected identity against an authorization context that represents a remote endpoint, or to create an identity from an endpoint address.

The [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] infrastructure calls the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.IdentityVerifier.TryGetIdentity%2A> method first to retrieve the service's identity from the message.

Next, the infrastructure calls the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.IdentityVerifier.CheckAccess%2A> method with the returned <xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointIdentity> and <xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.AuthorizationContext>.
For more information about implementing the class, see [How to: Create a Custom Client Identity Verifier](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Creates an instance of this class.
Implements a method to verify an identity.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the identity is verified; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Creates a default instance of this class.
Tries to create an identity from an endpoint.

The default <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.IdentityVerifier> creates a <xref:System.ServiceModel.DnsEndpointIdentity> based on the hostname portion of <xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress.Uri%2A> if an explicit <xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointIdentity> has not been specified as part of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress>.
The <xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress> to use for creating the identity.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the identity is returned; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
